name: Explosive Personality
flavor_text: Keep your distance from this one.

frame.name: Wave Frame
frame.description: One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher. Projectiles release a wave of energy when they contact the ground.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch parameters are particularly stable.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Confined Launch

perks.description:
This weapon is weighted for vertical recoil.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Countermass

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is optimized for projectile speed.
  •  Greatly increases projectile speed
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases blast radius
perks.name: Hard Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is well-balanced.
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Linear Compensator

perks.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Quick Launch

perks.description:
This barrel is broadly optimized for firing control.
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
perks.name: Smart Drift Control

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are particularly light and quick.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: High-Velocity Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles travel faster and have a controlled explosion.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Decreases blast radius
perks.name: Implosion Rounds

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves, with Kinetic weapons overflowing. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Each rapid final blow with this weapon progressively increases reload speed substantially for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for an improved duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for an improved duration.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one target. Improves handling.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon for an improved duration until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage. While this buff is active, grenade or melee kills of the same damage type greatly increase its damage and duration.
perks.name: Golden Tricorn

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage for an improved duration. While this buff is active, grenade or melee final blows of the same damage type greatly increase its damage for an improved duration.
perks.name: Golden Tricorn Enhanced

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield for an improved duration.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for an improved duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant increased Resilience and additional damage resistance from combatants.
perks.name: Land Tank
